title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 December 2015 - XWiki
content:
<sdumitriu> has quit  
08:14 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:16 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:00 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:44 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <sdumitriu2> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <sdumitriu> has quit  
09:48 <sdumitriu2> has quit  
09:48 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
09:49 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <msmeria> has quit  
09:51 <msmeria1> is now known as <msmeria>  
10:07 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:17 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
13:19 <gdelhumeau> I'll probably release 7.4 in the afternoon  
13:19 <gdelhumeau> so please don't commit on that branch unless it's verny necessary  
13:19 <gdelhumeau> \*verry  
13:57 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:32 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:38 <cjd> has quit  
14:56 <woshilapin> has quit  
14:57 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
14:59 <msmeria> has quit  
15:06 <mflorea> has quit  
15:19 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
15:32 <cjd> has quit  
15:37 <woshilapin> has quit  
15:47 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
15:52 <cjd> has quit  
16:12 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
16:37 <gdelhumeau> [ANN] The release of XWiki 7.4 is happening now :)  
16:38 <cjd> has quit  
16:43 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
16:51 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: can I still put a little commit on commons ? I did not noticed your first message about the release  
16:51 <tmortagne> hmm actually I pushed it already  
16:52 <tmortagne> so I guess my question is more do I close the issue for 7.4 or 7.4.1  
16:52 <tmortagne> seems to be 7.4.1  
17:03 <gdelhumeau> you pushed after I tag 7.4  
17:03 <gdelhumeau> so 7.4.1  
17:50 <woshilapin> has quit  
18:10 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:37 <Panther\_1> has left #xwiki  
18:41 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: can I be operator on that channel?  
18:41 <gdelhumeau> next time I'll mute the xwikibot during the extensions update  
18:42 <tmortagne> I think there is a command for this or you can also disable it on xwiki.org side  
18:43 <tmortagne> as for your original question I don't think I'm operator myself so I can't add you  
18:43 <tmortagne> I think only sdumitriu and Caleb are  
18:43 <gdelhumeau> indeed, you only have the voice right  
18:44 <tmortagne> no idea what voice right is but the only difference I think is that I registered an account on freenode so that "tmortagne" is always me  
18:49 <gdelhumeau> it's the same for me  
18:49 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
18:50 <gdelhumeau> when some nasty people are flooding the chat, an operator can use the "mute" mode, and so only people having the "voice" right can talk  
18:50 <gdelhumeau> and you have this voice  
18:50 <gdelhumeau> cjd: can you give me the OP right on that channel?  
19:02 <cjd> I can't but sdumitriu can  
19:02 <cjd> if I do, the ChanServ will remove it instantly  
19:02 <cjd> fun isn't it :)  
19:03 <tmortagne> has quit  
20:39 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
21:00 <sdumitriu> Let me try  
21:06 <sdumitriu> gdelhumeau: Can you try to mute xwikibot?  
21:07 <sdumitriu> XWIKI-123  
21:07 <gdelhumeau> #xwiki :You're not a channel operator  
21:07 <sdumitriu> Oh, so only ops can do that?  
21:07 <gdelhumeau> I suppose  
21:07 <gdelhumeau> with /mode +q xwikibot  
21:09 <sdumitriu> cjd: You should be allowed to give +O, weird  
21:10 <gdelhumeau> thx  
21:10 <gdelhumeau> with /mode +q xwikibot  
21:10 <sdumitriu> XWIKI-123  
21:10 <sdumitriu> XWIKI-123  
21:10 <gdelhumeau> nice :)  
21:10 <gdelhumeau> thx  
21:11 <sdumitriu> cjd and gdelhumeau have full founder rights now. vmassol had them before as well  
21:12 <sdumitriu> mflorea and tmortagne as well  
21:16 <gdelhumeau> see you  
21:16 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
21:57 <mflorea> has quit  
22:03 <cjd> ahh yeah, makes sense, I probably could have done it if I asked ChanServ to do it for me  
22:03 <cjd> I'll try that next time
